name: Pumpkin Smash Alpha Demo
description: Iggy the gremlin works the night shift at GnM pumpkin pie warehouse.  Jack-o'-lanterns have been appearing in the warehouse lately.  It's Iggy's job to smash as many pumpkins as he can during his shift.  Iggy would like to be the employee of the month one day and get the recognition he deserves, but Melvin seems to always out perform him by 5 pumpkins.   Melvin blames Iggy's bad luck on type of "soda" he drinks.  In reality the copious amounts of soda consumed by Iggy allows him to vomit and slow the Jack-o'-lanterns which makes his job easier.
